nodes.name: TBTCDevelopmentConstants
TBTCDevelopmentConstants

userdoc.notice: Constants for development testnet usages; tuned for testing and         faster iteration rather than security. These should NOT be deployed         on mainnet or mainnet-like ("staging") environments.
